infobox.Japanese title:: 絵の中の誘拐犯  (E no Naka no Yūkaihan)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Detective Boys  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Kazunobu Chiba  Kamen Yaiba
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Junko Yamanaka and Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi, Genta Kojima, Next Conan's Hint  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Ichiro Nagai as Kenzo Tsubakuro  Sachiko Kojima as Akio Tsubakuro  Yousuke Akimoto as Jukichi Sakai  Masayo Hosono as Kindergarten teacher  Jin Yamanoi as Yuuji Kisaki

sections.Situation: With time running thin, Conan and the Detective Boys followed clues left behind Akio's drawings and Kenzo stated his grandson's habit of providing his signature on an object he found appealing. In response, Conan quickly run to the scene where Akio drew that object and his team followed, in all turn of events, Ayumi in now with the kidnapper. What will happen to her and Akio?
sections.People:
- 55 years old
- Tsubakuro Financial Corporation head secretary
- 70 years old
- Tsubakuro Financial Corporation president
- Victim (kidnapped)
- 5 years old
- Kenzo's grandson
- Akio's kidnapper
sections.Trivia: - The kidnapper vehicle is a Classicgrun Perleff.met. 1995 Volkswagen Polo III [Typ 6N].
